summary: This document is an email forwarding a news article from The DC Patriot claiming that EMS audio reveals Jeffrey Epstein was dead for hours while on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. The email was sent on August 11, 2019, the day after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news article, reported to have been dead for hours while on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Death in Custody
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is reported to have died by suicide while on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. A news article claims EMS audio reveals he was dead for hours.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a news article from The DC Patriot dated August 11, 2019.
The article claims EMS audio reveals Jeffrey Epstein was dead for hours while on suicide watch.
The email was sent the day after Epstein's reported death in custody.
The source is a partisan news website (The DC Patriot), not an official document.
The document reflects early public speculation and conspiracy theories about the circumstances of Epstein's death.
